div.h1: Herrin Community Unit School District No. 4

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/yYHQOhjw66CKIdcfn-2wVqLqLZTztor9m5pFg4hDKEnjk360FmFv3HLPiRWg2QwKRNFCApc=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Thank you to all our Volunteers, Cooks, Cafeteria Assistants, Custodians, Bus Drivers, and Teachers helping serve the students and families of Herrin CUSD #4. We appreciate all you do! #tigerpride

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/u8o5CDYPFAO5ZaYXhI53eYkN82z3efgrOMzR_7CfHRYiUlhS3Fekpouy-_aGiRLrXTvDj4Y=w16383);

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: To create a safe orderly learning environment conducive to preparation of
To work to ensure that all students achieve
to the maximum potential of their abilities
To prepare students to be successful
in their career/technical training or higher education and in the workplace.

small.strong: All Persons within the district between the ages of 5-21 are accorded the right and opportunity to a free and equal education
